data.name: Ultimate Destruction Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Physics-based simulator where the player interact with, shatter physics, soft body physics, real-time fluid simulation, structural integrity, and much more!

50+ simulations allowing the player to destroy objects and structures in millions of ways. Custom Liquid and Scene editor allowing the player to release their creativity!

The objects that you destroy are collapsible and respond to the environment around them.
Play with soft body physics to dent metal objects, play around with AI that have ragdoll physics. Use fluid simulation to wash away objects and fill pools and rivers.
New objects and improvements may be added in the future with support and feedback and the success of the simulation.

There is no winning or losing. Ultimate Destruction Simulator is a sandbox experience allowing you to play around with Physics.

Modify Liquid Properties
.

Destroy Structures and Play with AI
.

data.short_description: Physics-based simulator that features realistic destruction through, shatter physics, soft body, real time fluid simulation, structural integrity, and much more! Create Custom Liquids with unique properties and build environments with the Scene Editor!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or similar. 3 Gb VRAM.
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or similar. 8 Gb VRAM.
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
